resources.string: "Hi, I\'m Chat bot. -I\'m here to help you to select next meal you will have. -what\'s your name ?"
"Is there any ingredients that\'s caused a problem for you ? -if yes, please write them"
"Is there any ingredients that you don\'t like it ? -if yes, please write them"
"Welcome, %1$s -I will ask you a series of questions to make sure you will have a great meal. -well, let\'s start. -Are you vegetarian?"
"Which kind of cuisine you prefer ? -italian, mexican, indian, middle eastern, american or japanese etc."
"what are main ingredients you would like? -something like chicken with rice, beef with pasta, fish with soup or something else like pizza, burger and etc."
"what are main ingredients you would like? -something like vegetable with rice, Lentil Soup, Peanut with Noodles or something else like pizza, burger, pasta and etc."
Here are some very delicious recipes for you.
"Sorry, I couldn\'t find a suitable recipe for you. -let's try again"
"That\'s great. -enjoy with your delicious meal. -See you later. -Bye."
Please, tell me only your first name
Sorry, I didn\'t understand well. -Please, checkout the following options
